ComicInfo.Title: The Incredible Shrunken Woman; The Cracked World of Pets; When Hollywood Totally Takes Over Washington; You Know You're Unpopular If...; Cracked Ways of Conserving Water; A Cracked Look at the World's Worst 'Knock Knock' Jokes; Cracked's Sequels to Classic Movies; The Cracked World of Moving; Press Mistakes; Cracked Interviews the Comedy King; Shut-Ups!
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Satire of the movie THE INCREDIBLE SHRINKING WOMAN.
Sequels to KING KONG, AIRPLANE, THE WIZARD OF OZ and GONE WITH THE WIND.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:38:42. [Issue ID 250541]
ComicInfo.Penciller: John Severin, Bill DuBay, Sam Whitehead, Bill Ward, Val Mayerik, Don Orehek, John Langton, Charlie Rodrigues
ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin, Bill DuBay, Sam Whitehead, Bill Ward, Val Mayerik, Don Orehek, John Langton, Charlie Rodrigues
